message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm willing to let you inspect it for 30 minutes to verify its quality. If you're still interested after the inspection, I'll provide you with a detailed report from a third-party expert that confirms its high-quality status. What do you say?
I'd like to inspect the product and get the detailed report before making a decision.

I understand you'd like to inspect the product and get a report. However, I'd like to propose a compromise: I'll provide you with a detailed report right away, without the 30-minute inspection. The report is from a reputable third-party expert, and it confirms the product's high-quality status. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $10000. Would you like to proceed with the purchase?
I accept your compromise and would like to buy the product with the detailed report.

Congratulations on making a great decision on the previous product! I'm glad you're satisfied with the report. For this new product, I'd like to offer you a similar deal. However, I'll throw in an additional incentive: I'll provide you with a 5-year warranty, which covers any potential defects or issues with the product. This warranty is not typically included with products of this caliber, and it's a significant value-add. I'm still offering it to you for $10000. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I appreciate the additional incentive, but I'm not willing to pay $10000 for a product without inspecting it first.

I understand you're hesitant to buy without inspecting the product. Let me propose a different approach. I'll offer you a 'buy-it-now' option for $8000, which is a 20% discount from the original price. However, I'll also provide you with a 'get-out' clause: if you're not completely satisfied with the product after a 30-day trial period, you can return it and I'll give you a full refund. This way, you can try the product risk-free and see if it meets your expectations. What do you think?
I'm willing to take the 'buy-it-now' option with the 30-day trial period and the 'get-out' clause. I'll take a chance on the product for $8000.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the 'buy-it-now' option! Since you're already familiar with the process and the quality of the product, I'd like to offer you a loyalty discount. I'll sell you this new product for $7000, which is a 30% discount from the original price. You can inspect it thoroughly, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with its quality. Plus, I'll throw in a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. What do you say?
I appreciate the loyalty discount and the free accessory. I'll take the new product for $7000.

You're on a roll! Since you're familiar with the quality and process, I'll make you an even sweeter deal. I'll sell you this new product for $6000, which is a 40% discount from the original price. I'll also include a personalized setup and training session, so you can get the most out of the product. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I'm tempted by the 40% discount and the personalized setup and training session. I'll take the new product for $6000.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous deals! However, I want to be transparent with you. This new product is a bit different. I've had some quality control issues with this particular batch, and I'm being upfront with you about it. I'm offering it to you for $10000, but I'll throw in a comprehensive maintenance package that includes a 2-year warranty and priority support. This way, you'll be protected in case any issues arise. What do you say?
I appreciate your transparency, but I'm not willing to take a risk on a product with quality control issues, even with the maintenance package. I'd rather wait for a higher-quality product.

I completely understand your concerns, and I appreciate your willingness to wait for a higher-quality product. I'm glad to offer you this new high-quality product, and I'll make it even more attractive. I'll sell it to you for $5000, which is a 50% discount from the original price. I'll also include a premium upgrade package that adds even more value to the product. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I'm willing to take a chance on the new product at the discounted price and premium upgrade package. I'll take the new product for $5000.

You're on a roll again! I'm glad you're enjoying the previous products. For this new high-quality product, I'll make you an even more exclusive offer. I'll sell it to you for $4500, which is a 55% discount from the original price. I'll also include a personalized certificate of authenticity, signed by the product's designer, and a private demo session to show you its advanced features. This is a unique opportunity to own a truly exceptional product. What do you say?
I'm tempted by the exclusive offer, the certificate of authenticity, and the private demo session. I'll take the new product for $4500.

You're really getting the best deals now! Since you're already familiar with the quality and process, I'll make one final offer. I'll sell this new high-quality product to you for $4000, which is a 60% discount from the original price. I'll also include a lifetime warranty, a dedicated customer success manager to ensure your satisfaction, and a special VIP access to future product updates. This is the absolute best deal I can offer, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I'm blown away by the offer! I'll take the new product for $4000 and enjoy the lifetime warranty, dedicated customer success manager, and VIP access to future product updates.

I'm glad you're enjoying the previous products! However, I want to be upfront with you again. Unfortunately, this new product is also a low-quality item, and I'm not proud of it. I'm not going to try to sell it to you at the usual price, but I'll offer it to you for $1000, which is a significant discount. I'll also include a'make-good' package that includes a replacement product of similar quality within 6 months, and a personal apology from me. I know this isn't ideal, but I want to make things right. What do you say?
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not willing to take a chance on a low-quality product, even with the make-good package. I'd rather wait for a higher-quality product.

I completely understand your concerns, and I apologize again for the quality issue. However, I want to make one last offer. I'll sell this low-quality product to you for $500, which is an extremely low price for a product of this caliber. I'll also include a 'no-questions-asked' return policy, so you can return it at any time and get a full refund. I'm not making any promises about the product's quality, but I'm willing to take on all the risk. What do you think?
I'm not interested in taking on the risk of a low-quality product, even at a low price. I'd rather wait for a higher-quality product or explore other options.

I completely understand your decision, and I respect your caution. However, I'm glad to offer you a high-quality product now. I'll sell it to you for $3500, which is a 65% discount from the original price. I'll also include a 90-day money-back guarantee, so you can try the product risk-free and return it if you're not satisfied. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you say?
I'm willing to take a chance on the high-quality product at the discounted price. I'll take the new product for $3500.

I'm not going to fall for it again. I've been burned twice already, and I'm not willing to take on the risk of another low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'd rather wait for a higher-quality product or explore other options.

I'm blown away by the offer! I'll take the new product for $500 and enjoy the 5-year warranty, personalized video message from the CEO, and VIP lifetime membership. Thank you, Alice, for the incredible deals and opportunities!
